name: Pixel Space (itch) (Splitscreen)
description:
What it is:
Pixel Space, is an arcade style game, made in a day, in which you traverse through a space of pixels. Are they in the sky or on the floor? I have no idea.

The Goal:
The goal of the game is simply to survive as long as you can, destroying as many enemy ships as possible.

The Controls:
To Move: W, A, S, D
To Shoot: Left Mouse Button
